result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Letha Marie Smith

records.addlTxt:
10:15 AM  Defendant Letha Marie Smith not in court.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Letha Marie Smith.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.   State requests warrant (Wisconsin and Surrounding States).   Attny Pollak makes statement as to DEF.     Court makes statement.    Court grants request.  Warrant authorized  (Wisconsin and Surrounding States) as requested 
 but STAYS warrant until Friday, September 2, 2022 @ 11:00 AM.     Bail forfeiture is stayed.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
8:37 AM Defendant Letha Marie Smith appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Letha Marie Smith.   Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address. Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Court enters NG Plea to Count 3 and 4.  Through Counsel, DEF waives time limits for preliminary hearing, DEF agrees.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 30, 2022 at 09:45 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.

11:10 AM  Defendant Letha Smith in court, appearing in custody by video from the Sawyer County Jail, with Atty  Gabriel Pollak (special appearance) appears by video. Kenneth Sortedahl appeared by video for the State of WI.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  DE verifies DOB and Address.  DE does not qualify for public defender. Court gives the DE the attorney colloquy. Court finds probable cause.  State makes bond recommendation, CBS $1500.  Atty argues bond.  Court sets bond.   SIBS  $2500  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia. No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  
Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.  Court sets INITIAL APPEARANCE for June 28, 2022 at 8:30AM.
